description: The child was abducted by a suspected paedophile in September from a village east of Moscow.
title: Russian special forces rescue boy kidnapped by suspected paedophile
title_page: Russian special forces rescue boy kidnapped by suspected paedophile - BBC News
maintext: In the video released by the Russian interior ministry, the suspect is heard telling the officers that the boy was playing on a computer notebook in the basement of the house.
